CustomField.formula: IF( Zuora_SoldTo_Contact__c = true, "Shipping Contact | " , "") & IF( Zuora_BillTo_Contact__c = true, "Billing Contact | " , "") & IF( DecisionMaker__c = true, "Decision Maker | " , "") & IF( FinanceContact__c = true, "Finance Contact | " , "") & IF( OperationalContact__c = true, "Operational Contact | " , "") & IF( TechnicalContact__c = true, "Technical Contact | " , "") & IF( inactiveEmployee__c = true, "INACTIVE!" , "")
CustomField.label: Contact Roles
